name: Malmö stad/City of Malmö
memberOrga: (all employees of the city are Fysiska personers and all have access if they wish, to the networks, see below that the city is a member of.)
goal:
Local authority, City of Malmö is Swedens 3rd largest city with more than 320 000 inhabitants

The city is heavily involved in European affairs.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Climate Action, Consumer Affairs, Culture, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Food Safety, Home Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Sport, Taxation, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Youth
